name: Killbots: A Zapp Brannigan Story!
description:
**Play as your favorite Doop Captain in his origins of how he became the greatest Doop Captain in history. 

**Runs in full screen, but runs best in Windowed mode. 

**This is my first Game made in a Console App. I hope everyone enjoys it. Also I don't own any part of Futurama or the Character Zapp, this is just a fun project Idea that I had.
